/** * Created by hao.cheng on 2017/5/3. */ import React from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, Icon, notification } from 'antd'; import BreadcrumbCustom from '../BreadcrumbCustom'; import EchartsViews from './EchartsViews'; import EchartsProjects from './EchartsProjects'; import { get } from '../../service/tools'; import umbrella from 'umbrella-storage'; class Dashboard extends React.Component { state = { data:{} } componentDidMount() { this.start(); } start = () => { get({ url: 'http://localhost:8080/admin/init?id='+(umbrella.getLocalStorage('user').role===2?umbrella.getLocalStorage('user').id:'0'), }).then((res) => { if (!res) { notification.open({ message: '后台异常', }); return 0; } if (res.rspCode !== '200') { notification.open({ message: res.rspMsg, }); } else { this.setState({ data: res.data, }); } }); } render() { return (
